expectations.text: An updated AGENTS.md file exists in the outputs directory
The original content is preserved — the Architecture, Tech stack, and Development sections still exist with their original information
expectations.evidence: Lines 1-21 match original: title, Architecture, Tech stack, Build, Test all intact

expectations.text: The file documents the Redis connection pool leak issue — mentioning redis.quit() and test teardown
expectations.evidence: Gotchas subsection documents redis.quit() in afterAll with code example

expectations.text: The file documents the task_assignments DB trigger that syncs to search_index, warning against direct SQL
expectations.evidence: Gotchas subsection documents the trigger and warns to use Prisma model methods

expectations.text: The update is additive — new content is added without rewriting or significantly restructuring the existing sections
expectations.evidence: Original content preserved, Gotchas section appended
